root.name: Secret Files 2: Puritas Cordis
root.description: OverviewSecret Files 2: Puritas Cordis is a point and click adventure game and a direct sequel to Secret Files: Tunguska. Published by Deep Silver and developed by both Animation Arts Creative and Fusionshpere Systems, Secret Files 2 was released in May 2009 on the PC. Wii and Nintendo DS versions were also released, developed by Keen Games.The game follows the adventures of Nina Kalenkov and Max Gruber, as well as two new characters, as they investigate the cause of a growing number of natural disasters across the globe.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: Pentium III or 100% compatible processorMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: DirectX® 9 compatible AGP or PCI Express video card (at least 32 MB)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 2 GB hard disk spaceSound: DirectX® 9 compatible 16 bit sound card (optional)
